name: youtube-outlier-discovery
description: Intelligent web application for discovering high-performing YouTube videos from adjacent channels

scripts.server:dev: cd server-python && uv run python src/index.py
scripts.build:server: cd server-python && uv pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: cd server-python && uv run python src/index.py
scripts.start:server: cd server-python && uv run python src/index.py
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd client && bun install && cd server-python && uv pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:python: cd server-python && uv pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: bun test --coverage && cd server-python && uv run python -m pytest
scripts.test:server: cd server-python && uv run python -m pytest
scripts.test:unit: bun run test:client && cd server-python && uv run python -m pytest
scripts.lint: eslint . --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx && cd server-python && uv run flake8 src/
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && cd client && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint -- --fix && cd client && npm run lint -- --fix && cd server-python && uv run black src/
scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,md}" && cd server-python && uv run black src/
scripts.format:python: cd server-python && uv run black src/
scripts.lint:python: cd server-python && uv run flake8 src/

author: Your Name
